description: Hisau Maiya is http://anidb.net/ch1919 [Emiya Kiritsugu]`s assistant, and her most common job is to aid his assassination tactics under his orders, much like Kiritsugu himself acted when he was an assistant to http://anidb.net/ch38669 [Natalia Kaminska]. She is a trained soldier, and makes common use of several sorts of tactics and tricks, such as long-range sniping and bomb planting. She is cold and professional, which makes it easier for Kiritsugu to act as he needs to. Her weapon of choice for direct combat is a Steyr AUG.
name: Hisau Maiya
